synopsis: Rowdy Toucan tries public transport. Lizard spies a special treat at a donut shop. Lion terrifies the junior employees. Toucan's mixer goes sideways.
Lion starts a diet. The coworkers discuss repurposing lightly used bathwater. Toucan has relationship issues. The CEO announces a rare cryptid search.
Lizard wants to learn a party trick to impress clients. Toucan is sent to reserve the company's flower-viewing spot. Lion and Lizard mourn a coworker.
Lion visits the dentist for severe tooth pain. Tasked with creating a company mascot, the three coworkers touch base with old friends for research.
The company holds its 36th meeting on cost reduction with Big Cat, Lizard and other members of the board. Toucan, however, gets into an unfortunate accident.

Toucan is tasked with taking work to Granny. Toucan is excited for summer vacation, but Lizard has some bad news. A nasty coworker is pulling pranks in the office and Toucan decides to take justice into his own hands.
The employees leave on a relaxing company trip to Hawaii, where they see the sights--and Toucan meets an old friend with big plans to strike it rich.
Readjusting to work post-vacation is harder than it looks. Toucan tries a new trick for escaping a bad date. Lizard has concerns about a new hire.
A shady lender offers Honeyguide a more permanent solution to his money problems, while Caracal, Lion, and Ratel attend a sketchy speed-dating event.
